title: 13.	 Accident
sample_text:
Accident means a sudden, unexpected, unusual, 
specific event which occurs at an identifiable time 
and place, but shall also include exposure to the 
elements resulting from such an event.

title: 14.	 by General Illness
sample_text:
by General Illness means on the sole grounds that 
the Insured has sustained an illness which manifests 
itself during the period of Insurance stated in Item 
Error Reference source not found. of the Schedule 
and which is not an illness falling within the terms 
of Definition 5., Substances Illness or Definition 6., 
Undiagnosed Illness and which is not in itself the 
direct consequence of identifiable physical injury 
caused by an Accident.

title: 15.	 by Substances Illness
sample_text:
by Substances Illness means on the sole grounds 
that the Insured has sustained an illness which 
manifests itself during the period of Insurance stated 
in Item Error Reference source not found. of the 
Schedule directly or indirectly consequent upon the 
influence of alcohol, drugs or narcotics.

title: 16.	 by Undiagnosed Illness
sample_text:
by Undiagnosed Illness means on the sole grounds 
that the Insured has sustained a set of physical or 
mental symptoms which is advised to a qualified 
medical practitioner during the period of Insurance 
stated in Item Error Reference source not found. 
of the Schedule and which is not detectable or 
diagnosable as an illness.

title: 18.	 Temporary Total Disablement (Loss of Licence)
sample_text:
Temporary Total Disablement (Loss of Licence) 
means the prevention of the Insured from acting 
in any capacity for which he holds a Licence(s)/
Certificate(s) due to the Licence(s)/Certificate(s) 
being temporarily suspended by the licence issuing 
authority on medical grounds.
	
	
Temporary Total Disablement (Loss of Licence) shall 
also include any period of self-suspension provided 
it is confirmed within 28 days by the issuance of a 
“temporarily unfit” assessment by the relevant licence 
issuing authority

title: 19.	 Licence(s)/Certificate(s)
sample_text:
Licence(s)/Certificate(s) means all Licences or 
Certificates held by the Insured in connection with 
his occupation.

title: 20.	 Date of Loss
sample_text:
Date of Loss means the first day that the Insured is 
suspended from active duty consequent upon the 
issuance of the temporary suspension or issuance 
of a long term unfitness assessment or permanent 
revocation of the Insured’s Licence(s)/Certificate(s). 
Suspension must be evidenced by receipt by 
the Underwriters within 28 days of issuance of a 
“temporarily unfit” assessment issued by the relevant 
licence issuing authority, failing which, the Date of 
Loss shall not be deemed to be earlier than the date 
of receipt by the Underwriters of the same.
